name: csv-to-json-array
title: CSV to JSON Array
description: This Raycast extension provides a powerful and reliable way to convert CSV files to JSON format. The script allows users to select one or more CSV files in Finder and automatically processes them, creating properly formatted JSON output files.
author: giali_coletta

commands.name: csv2json
commands.title: CSV to JSON Array
commands.subtitle: Select File
commands.description: Convert selected csv file into json file

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
